modName: Mjoll and Aerin - Daenerys and Viserys Targaryen -BETA-
summary: You\'ll find Daenerys and Viserys Targarien in Riften instead Mjoll and Aerin
descriptionHtml:
Version 1.01:
- Corrected face skin color
- New Apachii hairstyle
- Many face corrections to make her more similar to the original

DESCRIPTION:
Hi guys,
I\'ve converted Mjoll and Aerin into Daenerys and Viserys Targarien (Game of Thrones).
As always, my problem is to find hairstyle and dresses to make my GoT characters more similar, but I hope you\'ll like my work anyway...
I\'ve also changed the displayed name, so now instead of Mjoll you\'ll find Daenerys!
That\'s a BETA version, I\'ve leave all the original Mioll\'s stats, so please tell me if you prefer her as a mage, a worrior or a thief...
I\'ve also given her a Daedric sword and a Dark brotherhood Armor (in my skyrim is converted into Triss armor, but you\'ll find the original version)

If you have advices on how to make this mod better, please give them to me. 
Thank you in advance for your help
;-)

WINTER IS COMING
LordMaximStark

INSTALL:
1. put content (meshes folder, Mjoll.esp and Aerin.esp) into your data folder.
2. enjoy

REQUIRED:
- Better Females no Makeup by Bella
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
- Apachii Hair
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168
- Triss armor (if you want the same outfit as the preview)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4708

MY OTHER CONVERSIONS:
- Ulfric --> Eddard Stark
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10448
- Falk Firebeard --> Littlefinger
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10549
- Elisif the Fair --> Cercei Lannister 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10557


CREDITS:
Thanks to NPC Editor, Apachii Hair, Triss Armor creators
author: LordMaximStark
